StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [RCTAPI_GetCountryData]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
AS
SET NOCOUNT ON SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
----RssOss.[dbo].[RCTAPI_GetCountryData]
DECLARE @result varchar(max)
SET @result = (
SELECT --STATE_CODE AS Code, COUNTRY_DESCRIPTION AS countryName ,COUNTRY_DESCRIPTION AS countryId FROM MCRISS.[dbo].[GEO_LOCATION] WHERE (ISNUMERIC(STATE_CODE) = 0) AND (COUNTRY_DESCRIPTION IS NOT NULL) AND (LTRIM(COUNTRY_DESCRIPTION) <> '') AND (CAST(CITY_CODE AS int) = 0) AND (CAST(COUNTY_CODE AS int) = 0) AND STATE_CODE NOT IN ( 'CR' --'CORAL SEA ISLANDS' ,'IO' --'BR INDIAN OCEAN TERR' ) ORDER BY COUNTRY_DESCRIPTION
FOR JSON AUTO
)
SELECT @result
